EventData Class Reference

#include <Apoxi/Auxiliary/EventData.hpp>

Inheritance diagram for EventData:

[legend]

Public Member Functions

virtual ~EventData ()

Detailed Description

Base class for data passed to state machine events. Event data always has to be allocated dynamically since it is passed by pointer to the state machine and after having processed it the state machine will free the data.

See also:
StateMachine
